00078   void clrVisitedAllNets() const
00079   {
00080     for (unsigned int i=0; i<getNumNets(); ++i) getNet(i).clrVisited();
00081   }
00082   
00084   void clrFixedAllNets()
00085   {
00086     for (unsigned int i=0; i<getNumNets(); ++i) getNet(i).clrFixed();
00087   }
00088

00091   {
00092     for (unsigned int i=0; i<getNumCells(); ++i) getCell(i).clrVisited();

00162   static void connect(Pin& p, Cell& v, Net& e)
00163   {
00164     p._theCell = &v;
00165     p._theNet = &e;
00166     p._nextAdjPinForCell = v._firstAdjPin;
00167     v._firstAdjPin = &p;
00168     //### p._nextAdjPinForNet = e._firstAdjPin;
00169     //### e._firstAdjPin = &p;
00170   }

00199 template <class Net_, class Pin_ = Pin>
00200 class PinForNetCursorTmpl
00201 {
00202 public:
00204   PinForNetCursorTmpl(Net_& n) : 
00205     _nextPin(n.firstAdjPin()), 
00206     _lastPin((&n+1)->firstAdjPin()) 
00207   {
00208   }
00209 
00211   unsigned int count() const { return _lastPin - _nextPin; }
00212 
00214   bool hasNext() const { return _nextPin != _lastPin; }
00215 
00217   Pin_& getNext()
00218   {
00219     assert(hasNext());
00220     return *_nextPin++;
00221   }
00222 
00223 private:
00224   Pin_* _nextPin;         
00225   Pin_* const _lastPin;   
00226 };

00233 template <class Cell_, class Net_, class Pin_ = Pin>
00234 class CellCursorTmpl : public PinForNetCursorTmpl<Net_, Pin_>
00235 {
00236 public:
00238   CellCursorTmpl(Net_& n) : PinForNetCursorTmpl<Net_, Pin_>(n) {}
00239 
00242   Cell_& getNext() 
00243   { 
00244     return PinForNetCursorTmpl<Net_, Pin_>::getNext().getCell(); 
00245   }
00246 };

00251 template <class Cell_, class Pin_ = Pin>
00252 class PinForCellCursorTmpl
00253 {
00254 public:
00256   PinForCellCursorTmpl(Cell_& n) : 
00257     _firstAdjPin(n.firstAdjPin()), 
00258     _nextPin(_firstAdjPin) 
00259   {
00260   }
00261 
00263   bool hasNext() const { return _nextPin != 0; }
00264 
00266   void reset() { _nextPin = _firstAdjPin; }
00267 
00269   Pin_& getNext()
00270   {
00271     assert(hasNext());
00272     Pin_& p = *_nextPin;
00273     _nextPin = _nextPin->nextAdjPinForCell();
00274     return p;
00275   }
00276 
00277 private:
00278   Pin_* const _firstAdjPin;  
00279   Pin_* _nextPin;            
00280 };

00288 template <class Net_, class Cell_, class Pin_ = Pin>
00289 class NetCursorTmpl : public PinForCellCursorTmpl<Cell_, Pin_>
00290 {
00291 public:
00293   NetCursorTmpl(Cell_& n) : PinForCellCursorTmpl<Cell_, Pin_>(n) {}
00294 
00297   Net_& getNext() 
00298   { 
00299     return PinForCellCursorTmpl<Cell_, Pin_>::getNext().getNet(); 
00300   }
00301 };

00304 typedef PinForNetCursorTmpl<Net, Pin> PinForNetCursor;
00305 typedef PinForNetCursorTmpl<const Net, const Pin> PinForNetConstCursor;
